title: How effective were the anti-aircraft positions in Kent during WW2? - Quora

response.answer_text: Effective is relative, the anti aircraft in Britain involved was improved during the war and against the V 1 anti aircraft guns took down about as many as fighters did. I would think that they were pretty much equal in Kent to anywhere else, obviously more anti aircraft guns were based in the South East so Sussex and Kent would have more than the North or West of Britain.
